remark.ch: 限未通過英文畢業門檻之大學部學生選修，欲修課學生請攜帶未通過英檢成績單正本，於加退選期間至語言中心辦理資格審核。請於加退選前至語言中心人工加選，修課學生須出席第一堂課參加期初能力測驗。

goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to: 1. Demonstrate the ability of lifelong self-learning; 2. Use basic reading skills, such as skimming for main ideas, scanning for specific information, and guessing meaning from the context, to understand the main idea, and make inferences/predictions from the text; 3. Read and understand articles in different subject areas, such as History, Science, Social Studies and Language Arts; 4. Demonstrate an understanding of summary writing; 5. Appreciate the joys of reading, and develop the interests of extensive reading.
goal.ch: 1. 養成自學習慣，並培養更完整之英語運用能力及信心; 2. 應用基本閱讀技巧，並能正確無誤地解讀文章之寓意，進而做推論; 3. 閱讀歷史、科學、社會人文、語文學習等不同領域的英文文章，並掌握其內容； 4. 瞭解英文摘要寫作的基本要件，並能書寫合宜的摘要; 5. 養成閱讀課外讀物的興趣與泛讀的習慣。

This is a blended teaching class. The course provides students a time-flexible online learning environment, where students learn from the online materials by themselves asynchronously whenever available. In addition, instructors will provide 18-hour classroom lessons, plus individual tutoring sessions to students who need one-on-one assistance in reading and writing skills.
